INSERT INTO auction_goods( auction_goods_file_no ,donation_plan_no ,auction_state_no ,user_id ,small_category_no ,auction_goods_min_price ,auction_goods_title ,auction_goods_content ,auction_goods_instance_buy_price ,auction_goods_name ,auction_goods_bid_unit ,auction_goods_date ,auction_goods_pay_term ,auction_goods_bid_term ,auction_goods_bid_start_date ,auction_goods_bid_end_date ,auction_goods_hits ) VALUES ( null ,#{donationPlanNo} ,'입찰전' ,#{userId} ,#{smallCategoryNo} ,#{auctionGoodsMinPrice} ,#{auctionGoodsTitle} ,#{auctionGoodsContent} ,#{auctionGoodsInstanceBuyPrice} ,#{auctionGoodsName} ,#{auctionGoodsBidUnit} ,now() ,3 ,3 ,null ,null ,0 )
mapper.select: SELECT auction_goods.auction_goods_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_file_no ,auction_goods.donation_plan_no ,auction_goods.auction_state_no ,auction_goods.user_id ,auction_goods.small_category_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_min_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_title ,auction_goods.auction_goods_content ,auction_goods.auction_goods_instance_buy_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_name ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_unit ,auction_goods.auction_goods_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_pay_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_start_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_end_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_hits ,file.file_name ,file.file_ext FROM auction_goods JOIN file ON auction_goods.auction_goods_no = file.file_table_no AND 'auction_goods' = file.file_table_name WHERE file.file_ext IN('jpg','png','jpeg')

SELECT auction_goods.auction_goods_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_file_no ,auction_goods.donation_plan_no ,auction_goods.auction_state_no ,auction_goods.user_id ,auction_goods.small_category_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_min_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_title ,auction_goods.auction_goods_content ,auction_goods.auction_goods_instance_buy_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_name ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_unit ,auction_goods.auction_goods_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_pay_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_start_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_end_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_hits ,file.file_name ,file.file_ext FROM auction_goods JOIN file ON auction_goods.auction_goods_no = file.file_table_no WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT auction_goods.auction_goods_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_file_no ,auction_goods.donation_plan_no ,auction_goods.auction_state_no ,auction_goods.user_id ,auction_goods.small_category_no ,auction_goods.auction_goods_min_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_title ,auction_goods.auction_goods_content ,auction_goods.auction_goods_instance_buy_price ,auction_goods.auction_goods_name ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_unit ,auction_goods.auction_goods_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_pay_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_term ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_start_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_bid_end_date ,auction_goods.auction_goods_hits ,file.file_name ,file.file_ext FROM auction_goods JOIN file ON auction_goods.auction_goods_no = file.file_table_no WHERE auction_goods_no=#{auctionGoodsNo}

SELECT auction_goods.auction_goods_no ,bid.bid_no ,bid.user_id ,bid.auction_goods_no ,bid.bid_price ,bid.bid_date FROM bid INNER JOIN auction_goods ON bid.auction_goods_no = auction_goods.auction_goods_no WHERE auction_goods.auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo} ORDER BY bid_price DESC LIMIT 0,1;
mapper.update: UPDATE auction_goods SET auction_goods_hits = auction_goods_hits + 1 WHERE auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo}
UPDATE auction_goods SET auction_state_no = '입찰중' ,auction_goods_bid_start_date = now() ,auction_goods_bid_end_date = date_add(now(),interval+3 day) WHERE auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo};
UPDATE auction_goods SET auction_state_no = '경매 종료' ,auction_goods_bid_end_date = null WHERE auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo};
UPDATE auction_goods SET auction_state_no = '입찰 종료' WHERE auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo};
